title: Music Application
desc: Usage of Deezer API for Home page, Explore page, Artist's page, Album's page, Playlist's page
Audio player with song info, controls (play, pause, next, previous, volume, progression of the track), queue (with the current playlist)
Back-end for register, login, update profile and add to favorites
When the user is logged in, user can add artists, playlists, albums and songs to favorites.

title: Blog Application
desc: Usage of Unsplash API to search for images and integrate them into the article.
Users can create articles, like articles, leave comments on articles.
Admin page where admin can create, edit and delete categories and articles.
Back-end for register, login, profile, categories, articles, comments, likes.

title: Online Shop
desc: Usage of API for products, categories.
View the optimal layout for the app depending on their device's screen size.
View products by category and pagination.
Add products to cart, increase and decrease the quantity of the products and see the total price.
Register, login and logout to the website.

title: Food Recipes App
desc: Usage of API for recipes, categories, areas.
View the optimal layout for the app depending on their device's screen size.
View recipes by category and areas.
Search for recipes and view single page recipe with details.
